sentence.Network_cn: 他不好意思地咧嘴一笑。

sentence.Network_en: He just stood there, tonguetied and grinning sheepishly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他只是张口结舌地站在那儿, 羞怯地笑着.

sentence.Network_en: Hung - chien asked sheepishly, " Couldn't you add a bank ( P'o ) ? "
sentence.Network_cn: 鸿 渐 懦怯 地问道: “ 不能添个‘坡’字 么 ? ”

list.abs: somewhat sheepishly he confesses , " I've just learned to live with my own guilt . "他有些胆怯地承认：“我已学会了承认我自己的罪过。”
When she spilled the coffee , she smiled sheepishly and apologized., 当她打翻咖啡时她羞怯的微笑而且道歉.
Somebody went sheepishly and called for Mrs. Hall ., 有一个人胆怯地去叫霍尔太太了.

entry.tran: 窘迫的;难为情的;尴尬的
entry.def: If you look sheepish, you look slightly embarrassed because you feel foolish or you have done something silly.

example.ex: The couple leapt apart when she walked in on them and later came downstairs looking sheepish.
example.tran: 她走进屋时撞见这对情侣，搞得两人赶紧分开，后来又面带窘色地走下楼来。

sentences.sentence: "sheepishly he handed her back the money"
